description: two horses at left; central soldier in armor holding a sword up behind his back, preparing to slay a fallen soldier before him on ground; other soldiers and horses at right and in background at center
inscription:
Inscription

ULC, in brown: [142]; on back, in pencil: [249] and [Cambiaso]
medium: Pen and brown ink and gray wash
provenance: [Mia N. Weiner, New York, until 1981; sold August 3 for $600, to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1981-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Battle Scene
